opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellants.
Mr. Justice Roberts dissents.
Mr. Justice Cohen took ho part in the consideration or decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Miller, Appellant, v. Hawkins.
Argued September 30, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused July 5, 1967.
John W. English, with him John A. Bowler, and English, Gilson, Bowler, Shamp <& Levin, for appellants.
Murray R. Garber, for appellees.
May 24, 1967:
